phrases: She is not getting any strikes in.
Her pitch speed is about 80 kilometers per hour on average.
Looks like a break to me.
I will step on you if you stay there.
Could you please not corrupt these holy grounds with your cats?
The sparkling ace of the girls' softball team, and...
These grounds are a place for sportsmen to release their sweat as they aspire to greater heights!
It is not a place for people like you, who play with cats with no goals in mind!
I think we are trying to win some match.
Does not seem like you care very much.
I have let you off this long, like kids playing catch on the sidelines,
You will clear off these grounds so my softball team can practice!
Natsume Rin, you dare to mock my softball team?!
I am not letting a bully go.
It is your fault for bringing cats
We will make it a contest.
If you win, we will leave.
But if Rin wins, you will apologize for your underlings' behavior and go back to your own practice.
There is no way that I can lose!
I was just helping you with your pitching practice!
Oh my, look at the time!
We will finish this contest next time!
She got serious when her cat got bullied.
Super power at a time of crisis.
So that is how much she loves them.
Anyway, let us give that fastball a name.
Cannot we just call it a normal fastball?
Well, there is a cat soul in it.
Uh... I can tell that you like it...
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
No, it is right, right, left.
You are up for it, Tezuka?
You still cannot even if you beg.
Oh, it is just you, Riki?
It is been a while since the last one.
I wonder what it is this time.
Mysterious letters that appear every so often...
We still do not know who is sending them or why.
They said they would tell us some secret of the world if we complete all their tasks, but...
Do not you want to know the secret?
Whoever gave this order's a real busybody.
Rin, do you know what lovesickness is?
No, it means sick with love.
Which means it is a guy!
Let us go see him later.
I have to talk to a guy I do not know...
So you are the one giving us trouble.
Why are you acting like the bad guy?
Excuse me, but what could you be here for?
Now you are pissing me off.
Hey, you should not say that!
We do not have any evidence!
Who would you hear that from?
What do you plan to do?
It will be easier on you if you tell us.
Do not worry, we will keep it a secret.
Just do not tell anyone, okay?
When I see her, it feels tight right here.
During class, all I can think of is her.
I think she is my first love.
What kind of person is she?
She is really smart and athletic.
She is an amazing person and very popular.
I would never make a good match for her.
Wait, you have not even confessed to her yet!
If she rejects me, I will feel horrible.
But would not you feel worse if you just gave up and did not do anything?
Can you tell us who it is?
If we knew who it was, it would be easier for us to help.
You do not have to, though.
Why did you just say that name?
No, I did not ask for her name.
Aikawa means that he is in love with Sasasegawa-san.
But, Riki, that would only confuse me.
He said this person is smart, athletic, and popular.
That is not the Sasasasasa Sasami I know!
Let us not shatter his dreams, please.
You would make a good couple.
She always has an entourage with her.
You can be one of them.
Would not that put me in her friend zone?
No... it might be even worse than that...
She and I actually know each other.
I might be able to get you together.
Can you really get them together?
I will think about it now.
We are having a tea party in my room tonight.
Do you want to come too?
You can ask them about it.
To think you would come just like that.
It is a very good thing.
I have a question for you guys.
How can you get someone you like to like you back?
Rin-chan, are you in love with someone?!
I just want to know how...
Naoe-san and Kyousuke-san are connected by a strong bond.
They do not need any help.
In fact, you would just get in the way.
If you both reach for the same book and run into each other
while rounding a corner and shouting I am late!
in the library you will fall in love, apparently.
You got a few things mixed up there...
What do you think I should do?
Let us ask her what her hobbies are and the kinds of guys she is into.
What is the point of knowing?
We will tell Aikawa-kun, of course.
I am sure he wants to know more about the person he loves.
Just so you know, it will not go like it did last time!
More importantly, what are your hobbies?
What do you do on the weekends?
Why would you want to know?
Are you going to use it to make fun of me?
I will not make fun of you.
I just want to know more about you.
To the female named Sasasegawa Sasami.
What do you do on the weekends?
And what kind of guys are you into?
Like what they look like and their personality.
I do not have any hobbies.
I practice softball on the weekends.
How are we supposed to tell Aikawa-kun?
Let us ask Kengo what he thinks first.
That is kind of a crazy first step...
Anyway, that is how it is.
I do not know what to think.
First off, do you know who Sasasegawa-san is?
We always run into each other in the hallways, and she always greets me.
So she is trying to make passes...
What answer would end this talk?
Just say, I do not care for her.
I do not care for her.
Kengo does not care for her.
What does Miyazawa-san have to do with it?
Or maybe he is feeling ill?
I am pretty sure it is the former.
Kengo does not care for her.
It is a chance for you.
We will think about that first.
Kengo is freaking huge, scary, and brusque, but he is strong.
Well, if you mean he is manly...
If you beat up the ever-so-strong Kengo in front of Salami's face,
she will fall for you, no doubt.
But I do not do any sports.
There is no way I would win...
Then we will take the shared hobbies route.
Sasasegawa-san said she did not have any...
Just suggest something that you might be able to share.
She would not be into those.
Is there anything you listen to?
How about lending her a CD you like?
You can imply your secret love for Sasami through your own original lyrics!
Are you trying to pick a fight with me?
You can make up for it!
I told you, I just cannot do it.
If you do not take him by surprise, that is.
I still do not think I can win!
Then it will be a sneak attack times 3.
First, I will pretend to trip and take out Kengo's legs.
Naturally, Kengo will jump to avoid me.
Next, Riki will shout, Set meal A, coming right up!
and throw a tray at Kengo's head.
Then he will put his hands behind his head in defense.
Then you will shout, Miyazawa Kengo, I have got you!
I am pretty sure he will not even feel it...
Get a running start and put your soul into it!
He will have no way to dodge.
If you have the momentum, he will fly!
You will need to hit him hard.
Set meal A, coming right up!
Kyousuke made you do it, right?
My, it is that rude fellow from before!
We will think of something better next...
I will just forget about it.
Thanks for everything you have done for me.
You are just going to give up?!
Rin, have you ever been in love?
Maybe we tried to fix everything so fast because neither of us have been in love.
Is not love a happy thing?
I am pretty sure it is a painful thing.
He wants to forget, but he cannot.
He will be in pain forever.
What was the task this time?
It did not say to realize his love.
We do not need to get them together.
We just need to ease the pain of unrequited love.
Riki, I will be right back!
Why do you keep calling me out?
You mean that rude fellow too?
Well, if that is the case...
C-Could I get your phone number?
You want to be friends with me?
There is this person who wants to be your friend...
Then that person can come talk to me directly.
Whenever he sees you, his chest tightens.
He cannot even study because he is thinking about you all the time.
That is the kind of person he is.
I do not know much about stuff like that.
But he was in a lot of pain.
I do not care about him.
But I know the pain in his chest.
But you can only send one text per day!
You will need to get to know her better before anything else!
Also, try not to think about her except when you are texting.
But you have done as much as you could.
I think you did a good job.
I wonder if the day will come when Rin falls in love.
Let us take a cat and
I am not letting a bully go!
I have not done anything yet!
You messed up your own name...
Come to get in our way again?
I would like to ask you something.
Could you tell me what Miyazawa-sama's favorite food is?
Tell her it is cup yakisoba without throwing the water out.
It is cup yakisoba without throwing the water out.
Not throwing the water out is good for the environment!
And it was a lie from Masato anyway.
I will seal that mouth of yours shut today!
Girls, you know what to do!
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
On a night of shooting stars,
I watched Kud perform a strange ceremony.
Riki, have you ever seen the Southern Cross?
One by one, Kud's secrets are revealed.
